org.apache.hadoop.fs.contract

Interface ContractOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContractAppendTest, AbstractContractConcatTest, AbstractContractCreateTest, AbstractContractDeleteTest, AbstractContractMkdirTest, AbstractContractOpenTest, AbstractContractRenameTest, AbstractContractRootDirectoryTest, AbstractContractSeekTest, AbstractFSContractTestBase, TestFTPContractCreate, TestFTPContractDelete, TestFTPContractMkdir, TestFTPContractOpen, TestFTPContractRename, TestLocalFSContractAppend, TestLocalFSContractCreate, TestLocalFSContractDelete, TestLocalFSContractLoaded, TestLocalFSContractMkdir, TestLocalFSContractOpen, TestLocalFSContractRename, TestLocalFSContractSeek, TestRawlocalContractAppend, TestRawlocalContractCreate, TestRawlocalContractDelete, TestRawlocalContractMkdir, TestRawlocalContractOpen, TestRawlocalContractRename, TestRawlocalContractSeek

    public interface ContractOptions
    Options for contract tests: keys for FS-specific values, defaults.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONTRACT_OPTIONS_RESOURCE
      name of the (optional) resource containing filesystem binding keys : "contract-test-options.xml" If found, it it will be loaded
      static String FS_CONTRACT_KEY
      Prefix for all contract keys in the configuration files
      static String IS_BLOBSTORE
      Blobstore flag.
      static String IS_CASE_SENSITIVE
      Is a filesystem case sensitive.
      static String MAX_FILESIZE
      Maximum filesize: 0 or -1 for no limit
      static String MAX_PATH_
      Maximum path length
      static String REJECTS_SEEK_PAST_EOF
      Is seeking past the EOF allowed?
      static String RENAME_CREATES_DEST_DIRS
      Flag to indicate that the FS can rename into directories that don't exist, creating them as needed.
      static String RENAME_OVERWRITES_DEST
      Flag to indicate that the FS does not follow the rename contract -and instead only returns false on a failure.
      static String RENAME_REMOVE_DEST_IF_EMPTY_DIR
      Flag to indicate that the FS remove dest first if it is an empty directory mean the FS honors POSIX rename behavior.
      static String RENAME_RETURNS_FALSE_IF_DEST_EXISTS
      Flag to indicate that the FS returns false if the destination exists
      static String RENAME_RETURNS_FALSE_IF_SOURCE_MISSING
      Flag to indicate that the FS returns false on a rename if the source is missing
      static String SUPPORTS_APPEND
      Flag to indicate that append is supported
      static String SUPPORTS_ATOMIC_DIRECTORY_DELETE
      Flag to indicate that directory deletes are atomic
      static String SUPPORTS_ATOMIC_RENAME
      Flag to indicate that renames are atomic
      static String SUPPORTS_BLOCK_LOCALITY
      Does the FS support multiple block locations?
      static String SUPPORTS_CONCAT
      Does the FS support the concat() operation?
      static String SUPPORTS_SEEK
      Is seeking supported at all?
      static String SUPPORTS_SEEK_ON_CLOSED_FILE
      Is seeking on a closed file supported? Some filesystems only raise an exception later, when trying to read.
      static String SUPPORTS_STRICT_EXCEPTIONS
      Flag to indicate that this FS expects to throw the strictest exceptions it can, not generic IOEs, which, if returned, must be rejected.
      static String SUPPORTS_UNIX_PERMISSIONS
      Are unix permissions
      static String TEST_RANDOM_SEEK_COUNT
      Limit for #of random seeks to perform.
      static String TEST_ROOT_TESTS_ENABLED
      Flag to indicate that tests on the root directories of a filesystem/ object store are permitted

    • Field Detail

      • CONTRACT_OPTIONS_RESOURCE

        static final String CONTRACT_OPTIONS_RESOURCE
        name of the (optional) resource containing filesystem binding keys : "contract-test-options.xml" If found, it it will be loaded
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FS_CONTRACT_KEY

        static final String FS_CONTRACT_KEY
        Prefix for all contract keys in the configuration files
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_CASE_SENSITIVE

        static final String IS_CASE_SENSITIVE
        Is a filesystem case sensitive. Some of the filesystems that say "no" here may mean that it varies from platform to platform -the localfs being the key example.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_BLOBSTORE

        static final String IS_BLOBSTORE
        Blobstore flag. Implies it's not a real directory tree and consistency is below that which Hadoop expects
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RENAME_CREATES_DEST_DIRS

        static final String RENAME_CREATES_DEST_DIRS
        Flag to indicate that the FS can rename into directories that don't exist, creating them as needed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RENAME_OVERWRITES_DEST

        static final String RENAME_OVERWRITES_DEST
        Flag to indicate that the FS does not follow the rename contract -and instead only returns false on a failure.

      • RENAME_REMOVE_DEST_IF_EMPTY_DIR

        static final String RENAME_REMOVE_DEST_IF_EMPTY_DIR
        Flag to indicate that the FS remove dest first if it is an empty directory mean the FS honors POSIX rename behavior.

      • SUPPORTS_STRICT_EXCEPTIONS

        static final String SUPPORTS_STRICT_EXCEPTIONS
        Flag to indicate that this FS expects to throw the strictest exceptions it can, not generic IOEs, which, if returned, must be rejected.

        static final String TEST_ROOT_TESTS_ENABLED
        Flag to indicate that tests on the root directories of a filesystem/ object store are permitted
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEST_RANDOM_SEEK_COUNT

        static final String TEST_RANDOM_SEEK_COUNT
        Limit for #of random seeks to perform. Keep low for remote filesystems for faster tests
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
